question:
There have been some problems with the bus servicing, especially its reliability, in your area over the last two weeks. Write a letter to the manager of the bus company, in your letter:
Describe what the problems are
Explain how these problems are affecting you
Suggest what you would like the company to do
text: I am writing this letter to inform you, about the problem I am facing with the bus servicing in my area over the last two weeks. The main problem is that, the bus is having engine problems with it which is causing enormous sound pollution, as well as air pollution from its exhaust in my area. Moreover, there are no technicians in the nearby area to repair it instantly.

This issue has been troubling me, as its high horn sound is creating the nuisance in our society and affecting our health situation. In other words, the elderly people are suffering the most because of this situation. In addition, there is no supervisor or concerned person to monitor the situation in our community.
I would like the firm to please look into this matter and solve this query at the earliest. Please do the needful at the earliest. I shall be very grateful to you.

The singular verb is does not appear to agree with the plural subject engine problems with it. Consider changing the verb form for subject-verb agreement.
